page.title: 10HOUSES IN PENNARD.
page.content: MOST OF THE HOUSES IN PENNARD ARE MODERN __ BUILT SINCE 1960. SOUTHGATE HAS SMALL ESTATES AND PENNARD HAS SLIGHTLY LARGER ONES. IN SOUTHGATE A NEW ESTATE CALLED MEADOWCROFT WAS BUILT DURING THE EARLY 1980'S. THE HOUSES ARE EITHER DETACHED OR SEMI DETACHED AND MOST ARE PEBBLE_DASHED WITH GARAGES JOINED ON. SOME OF THE HOUSES HAVE DOUBLE _GLAZED WINDOWS AND MOST OF THEM HAVE GARDENS. THERE ARE A FEW OLD HOUSES. THE OLDEST COTTAGE IS CALLED PENNARD COTTAGE. IT WAS BUILT BETWEEN 1910 AND 1912. THERE ARE ALSO A FEW FARM HOUSES BUT THERE ARE NO COUNCIL HOMES. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE FOUND NEAR THE SCHOOL IN LINKSIDE DRIVE, PENNARD DRIVE, THREE CLIFFS DRIVE AND NORTON DRIVE. THE SECOND LARGEST ESTATE, WHICH IS IN SOUTHGATE, HAS MOST OF ITS HOUSES IN HEATHERSLADE ROAD AND CLOSE AND FOXHOLE DRIVE.
